explains: n. 荒谬，荒唐；荒谬的言行
wordGroup: reduction to absurdity n. 归谬法，反证法

sentences.en: His works on the absurdity and sufferings of life create the most comprehensive irony.
sentences.cn: 他的作品对生活中所有的荒谬和苦难作出最彻底的反讽刺。

sentences.en: This use of dialogue underscores not only the dizzy quality of the character played by Katherine Hepburn, but also the absurdity of the film itself and thus its humor.
sentences.cn: 这种对白的使用不仅突出了凯瑟琳·赫本所扮演角色的大大咧咧的特性，也突出了电影本身的荒谬和幽默。

sentences.en: It was only later that she could see the absurdity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 直到后来她才看出了那种局面的荒唐。
